items.summary: Update the backend login flow to stop triggering the authorization error "only admin can assign user roles" when a user logs in with the valid credentials (Darling/181818 or MyHoney/182518). Specifically, remove or replace the current role-assignment call that requires admin privileges during login so that successful credential verification results in the caller being treated as authenticated for subsequent operations (profiles, messages, gallery) without needing any admin initialization or admin token.

Ensure the frontend displays a clear English error message when the backend returns the authorization error string "only admin can assign user roles" during login (in case it occurs again), instead of showing the raw backend error text.
